content:
NativeObjectSecurity+ExceptionFromErrorCode Delegate

In this Article

Provides a way for integrators to map numeric error codes to specific exceptions that they create.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Security.SecuritySafeCritical]
protected delegate Exception NativeObjectSecurity.ExceptionFromErrorCode(int errorCode, string name, SafeHandle handle, object context);

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Delegate
  • NativeObjectSecurity+ExceptionFromErrorCode
